channel.title: F2p 2006 | ReLive The Past
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/333/8n9y.jpg[/img][/URL][/center] [center]Website : http://sabatinoonline.enjin.com/[/center]
[center]This is 2006 F2p remade, I will add more features based on what is asked from the players by having a poll on the site. This has fairly good of an xp rate everyone to get started. With that no flaming please? Just play have fun and lets make a great rsps.[/center]
[center]Combat Features : - PvP fully complete - PvN fully complete - Perfect max hit formulas - Perfect accuracy formula - Every weapon special attack - Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) - Equipment requirements - Degradable equipment - Weapon poisoning
Skills:
- Agility - Cooking - Crafting - Farming - Firemaking - Fishing - Fletching - Herblore - Mining - Prayer - Runecrafting - Slayer - Smithing - Thieving - Woodcutting
Quest: - Cook's Assistant - Doric's Quest - Imp Catcher - Rune Mysteries Quest - Sheep Shearer - Vampire Slayer - Witch's Potion
Minigames:
- Duel Arena
Sounds: - Music & Sounds - All skilling sounds - All combat sounds - Working music player and unlocking - Music playing in all regions - Music fade and volume control
Random Events: - Genie - Drunken dwarf - Evil chicken - Freaky Forester - River troll - Rock golem - Shade - Spirit tree - Zombie More to come...
Miscellaneous Hair dresser, bank pins, sailing, can't access members area, clipping all around, proper npc's are agressive . 20x exp at the moment.[/center] More To come

item.description:

Good luck!

Is this going to be Free 2 Play 2006 only? If so, why are there members skills/minigames listed?

Read full topic

item.title: F2p 2006 | ReLive The Past
item.dc:creator: @Bnb Bnb
item.description:
@Bnb wrote:

[center][URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][/URL][/center]
[center]Website : http://sabatinoonline.enjin.com/[/center]

[center]This is 2006 F2p remade, I will add more features based on what is asked from the players by having a poll on the site. This has fairly good of an xp rate everyone to get started. With that no flaming please? Just play have fun and lets make a great rsps.[/center]

[center]Combat Features :

  • PvP fully complete
  • PvN fully complete
  • Perfect max hit formulas
  • Perfect accuracy formula
  • Every weapon special attack
  • Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)
  • Equipment requirements
  • Degradable equipment
  • Weapon poisoning

Skills:

  • Agility
  • Cooking
  • Crafting
  • Farming
  • Firemaking
  • Fishing
  • Fletching
  • Herblore
  • Mining
  • Prayer
  • Runecrafting
  • Slayer
  • Smithing
  • Thieving
  • Woodcutting

Quest:

  • Cook’s Assistant
  • Doric’s Quest
  • Imp Catcher
  • Rune Mysteries Quest
  • Sheep Shearer
  • Vampire Slayer
  • Witch’s Potion

Minigames:

  • Duel Arena

Sounds:

  • Music & Sounds
  • All skilling sounds
  • All combat sounds
  • Working music player and unlocking
  • Music playing in all regions
  • Music fade and volume control

Random Events:

  • Genie
  • Drunken dwarf
  • Evil chicken
  • Freaky Forester
  • River troll
  • Rock golem
  • Shade
  • Spirit tree
  • Zombie
    More to come…

Miscellaneous
Hair dresser, bank pins, sailing, can’t access members area, clipping all around, proper npc’s are agressive .
20x exp at the moment.[/center]
More To come
